name: Team Of Myself
description:
Team Of Myself is a time puzzle game where you have to get out the current room. In order to open the door, you have to push all buttons down...

The point is, you cannot be on every buttons at the same time. So you have to get back in time and go to a different direction in the past !

If one of your past incarnation encounter an obstacle, it creates a paradox and you lose.

Controls (temporary):
Arrow key to move

Space to go back in time

Return to pause

Escape to exit,while ingame

Shift (Select) is currently useless

A Window port will be done soon.
